name: Talking Pinocchio
description:
Experience and rediscover the wonderful adventures of Pinocchio’s with Talking Pinocchio!

Did you know that Pinocchio has dreamed of becoming an app you could have on your phone? His dream came true and he is now looking forward to playing with you!

TALKING PINOCCHIO will reveal all the secrets of Pinocchio that you never heard about in the story! For example if his nose grows he can use it as a flute! And Pinocchio has lied so much lately that he already can teach you 10 songs that he knows now by heart.

He also needs your help to escape from the puppeteer! Help Pinocchio jump through the holes in the wall to get away. Once safe and sound at home other surprises await him. He is always being bothered by moths who want to eat his clothes while he sleeps so you’ll have to help him get a good night’s rest. If you help him out then he will introduce you to his goldfish and share with you the treasures he has in his toy box. If you are lucky, he may even read a story to you.

You can turn any of these experiences with Pinocchio into a movie and then show all of your friends the wonderful fun you’re having on YouTube, Facebook or by email! “TALKING PINOCCHIO” will make you laugh and play for hours! Discover all the possibilities, games, and end up rolling on the floor laughing with this crazy puppet!

WHAT YOU CAN DISCOVER WITH TALKING PINOCCHIO?
* Talk to him and he’ll repeat what you say.
* Discover all his movements.
* Play at 2 funny games to help Pinocchio in his adventures!
* Have fun playing the flute.
* Enjoy the Carlo Collodi’s illustrated e-story!
* Discover his toy box and his crazy golden fish
* Live the Pinocchio’s adventures and send pictures to your friends!
* Record a video of him and share it with the world!

AND MORE…

AN HIGH-QUALITY MUSICAL INSTRUMENT

TALKING PINOCCHIO includes a fun musical instrument!

1. If TALKING PINOCCHIO´s nose grows, he can use it as a flute! And Pinocchio has lied so much lately that he already can teach you 10 songs that he knows now by heart.

TWO AWESOME MINI-GAMES
TALKING PINOCCHIO also includes two awesome mini-games!

1. TALKING PINOCCHIO needs your help to escape from the puppeteer! Help Pinocchio jump through the holes in the wall to get away.

2. Once TALKING PINOCCHIO is safe and sound at home other surprises await him. He is always being bothered by moths who want to eat his clothes while he sleeps so you’ll have to help him get a good night’s rest.

IMPORTANT NOTE FOR USERS
Your iPod Touch, iPhone, or iPad must have a microphone or headphones with an attached microphone. Otherwise, the voice-recording features will not work.
